title: Drawing, "Two Figure Compositions for the Painting "Lady Washington's Reception"", 1860
medium:
Graphite on graph paper
Support: White wove graph paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper margin at one inch intervals: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9; at lower margin at one inch intervals: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
description: Two alternative figure compositions, one above the other.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Figure Compositions for the Painting "Lady Washington's Reception"", 1860.
1860. Graphite on graph paper
Support: White wove graph paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1942-50-187.
